column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/2102ab9f5cb542e6727e0f25e670d8549aa1bf1a for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
I'll see if I can check this out today or tomorrow...\n
I can confirm this is working:\n`-choosedatadir` can be used to provide custom data directories\n

Great!

Agree with the code changes too? I didn't make any obvious logic errors?
I'd like to also take a look at URI handling before giving a final ACK. Currently I need to resync my mainnet testnode. Changed init orderd looks fine to me...\n

I can confirm URI and payment-request handling with a running instance is working. I can't test click-to-start-Bitcoin, as I depend on command-line switches ;).

ACK
